General.Name: China Silver Group Limited
General.Description: China Silver Group Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, sells, and trades in silver ingots, palladium, and other non-ferrous metals in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through four segments: Manufacturing, New Jewellery Retail, Silver Exchange, and Fresh Food Retail. It is also involved in the designing and sale of gold, silver, colored gemstone, gem-set, and other jewelry products through television and video shopping channels, third party platforms, and CSmall.com online platform, as well as offline retail and service networks, such as CSmall shops, Shenzhen Exhibition Hall, and third-party offline points of sale; and integrated online-and-offline sale of fresh food. In addition, the company provides professional electronic platform and related services for trading of silver ingots, as well as electronic platforms, software as a service, and branding services for agricultural supply chain. Further, it offers money lending, energy technology promotion and consultation, property development, and software development services. China Silver Group Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

4.Name: Mr. Jiang  Pengzhan
4.Title: Chief Financial Officer of Longtianyong Nonferrous Metals
